comment.author: 77936638@N00
comment._content: The buildings are (still) part of the Dutch parliament. A shot from recent winter from me: www.flickr.com/photos/gravlax/6848262579

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gravlax] The pond looks really different covered with ice...nice photo - thanks for posting! Thanks also for information about the Dutch parliament at Binnenhof. Read more about it on Widipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binnenhof /Anna B.
